VendorCode: The Vendor Code field is an alphanumeric field and should exactly match how it is setup in the system.  If an exact match is not found, the row will be marked as invalid and skipped in the upload.
PropertyCode: The Property Code field is an alphanumeric field only and is limited to 10 characters.  This field will be checked for an exact match.  If no exact match exists, the row will be marked invalid.  This is a required field for this upload.  If missing, the row will be marked inactive.
GLCode: The GL Code field is an alphanumeric field and should exactly match how it is setup in the system.  This is a required field for this upload.  If an exact match is not found, the row will be marked as invalid and skipped in the upload.  PLEASE NOTE:  The GL Code must already be assigned to the vendor before the split can be uploaded.
Percent: This is a numeric value which should go out 2 decimal places.  This field should not allow a % sign to be input.  25% should be input as 25.00.  For all lines with the same splitname, the value should be equal exactly to 100.00.  If the values do not add up to that amount, all lines with the same SplitName will be marked invalid and will be skipped in the upload.
